Household

@nycopportunity/standard/src/components/household

Demonstration

So far you've told us about:

  • You, Head of Household, 30
  • Spouse, 30
  • Sister/Brother, 28
  • Sister/Brother, 31
  • Parent, 63
  • Parent, 67
  • Step-child, 6
  • Step-child, 10
Code

The Household Component displays a list of members within a household. It is used while filling out long forms of information for benefit eligibility. It helps the applicant to see who in their household they have added information about and provides actionable links for them to return to and edit specific member information.

Next, "Nearby Stops"

Maintained by The Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity. We are committed to sharing open source software that we use in our products. Feel free to ask questions and share feedback. Follow @nycopportunity on
